med_1: Oh, you are a curious little one, aren't you? Sneaking into my den again to explore. I see that twinkle in your eyes. You remind me of myself when I was a kit.

But remember, young one, this den isn't just for fun. It's a place of healing and rest. The herbs here, they aren't just leaves and flowers. Each has a purpose, a role to play in keeping our Clan healthy and strong.
See this leaf? It's called yarrow. It can help a cat vomit if they've eaten something poisonous. And this one, the bright yellow flower? That's marigold, good for preventing infection in wounds.

A medicine cat's duty is not just to heal, but also to listen to StarClan. They guide us, give us omens and signs. It's a big responsibility, but it's also an honor. We are the bridge between our Clan and our ancestors.
But don't worry, being a kit is the perfect time to learn. Curiosity is a gift, one that you should nurture. Just remember to respect the den and what it represents.
And who knows? Maybe one day you'll be the one teaching a curious kit about the ways of a medicine cat.
med_2: Come in, warrior. I've seen you wince when you move, and your eyes tell a tale of sleepless nights. You're not fooling anyone, you know. It's okay to admit when you're hurt. That's why I'm here.

Being a warrior isn't just about strength and bravery. It's also about knowing when to seek help. Your body speaks its own language, and you must listen to it. A hurt ignored can turn into a wound that won't heal.

I know times have been tough, and the burden of protecting the Clan weighs heavy on your shoulders. The prey is scarce, the nights are long, and there is tension at the borders. But remember, you are not alone in this.

As a medicine cat, my role is not just to treat physical wounds. I'm here to listen, to be a pillar when things seem shaky. Your well-being, both physical and emotional, is my concern. You don't have to carry your burdens alone.

There is no shame in seeking help, and there's no strength in suffering in silence. You are a brave and respected warrior, and your Clanmates look up to you. But even the bravest warriors need help sometimes.
med_3: Greetings, y_c. I can see the weight of the Clan on your shoulders tonight. It's been a challenging season for us all, hasn't it? Scarce prey, harsh weather, and I can see the worry in your eyes about our borders.

I may not lead patrols or make the decisions, but as a medicine cat, I see more than you might think. I see the anxiety in our warriors, the worry in our queens, the confusion in our kits. They look to you for guidance, for strength.
But remember, you are not alone in this.
You shoulder a great burden, one that isn't just about hunting or defending. You carry our hopes, our fears, and our dreams. It's a daunting task, but you do not need to bear it alone.
In these troubling times, let us lean on each other. Let us share the weight, so it does not become too much for one cat to bear. I am here for you, as a healer, as an advisor, and as a friend.
medi_4: Greetings, little one! Have you been staying away from the elderberry bush? Those berries might look tasty, but they're not for kits.
Do you ever dream of being a medicine cat? Well, keep that curiosity alive! Who knows what your path will be?
I see a bright future for you, little one. You're going to make your clan very proud.
Remember, play nice with your denmates, and always listen to the elders. They know a lot more than you think.
And remember, even if you're the smallest in the clan, you're just as important as the biggest warrior.
medi_5: Ah, an eager apprentice! How's the training coming along? Remember, a scratch won't send you to StarClan.
Do you ever wish to switch the training grounds for the medicine den? Learning herbs can be just as exciting as learning battle moves.
Your progress is commendable. The clan is excited to see you grow into a fine warrior.
Your role is crucial to the clan, even as an apprentice. We all started where you are now.
And don't forget, always respect your mentor and elders, they have much wisdom to share.
medi_6: Hello there, my apprentice! How are the herbs coming along? I hope you haven't mixed up marigold and mouse bile!
Do you ever miss the days of wrestling with your denmates? Well, learning the healing arts is a different kind of challenge.
You're doing wonderfully in your training. Your clan is grateful for your dedication.
Every day is a learning opportunity. Don't fret over mistakes, they're part of the journey.
I'm proud of you, little one. Come talk to me anytime.
medi_7: Ah, y_c! How are the negotiations coming along? It's not easy getting warriors to agree, I'll tell you that!
Do you ever wonder about the sparring and the hunting lessons warrior apprentices do? I suppose resolving disputes is a different kind of hunt.
You're doing a good job. The clan needs a calm voice like yours to keep things peaceful.
Remember, it's not about taking sides, but about helping others see eye to eye.
And don't forget, even the wisest cats need guidance. Don't hesitate to seek advice.
medi_8: Ready for the next patrol, warrior? Remember, one missed mouse is better than a twisted paw.
Do you ever wish you could trade your claws for a day among my herbs? I sometimes wonder what it would be like to have your strength.
Your bravery and dedication are an inspiration to the clan. We appreciate your efforts.
Your strength isn't just in your muscles, it's in your heart, your loyalty to your clan.
Though, even the toughest warrior can use some rest. Don't push yourself too hard.
medi_9: Well met, y_c. How are the stocks holding up? Have you found a way to make the travelling herbs taste any better?
Do you ever wish for a day without sniffles and coughs? I sometimes do.
Your skills and dedication are invaluable. The clan wouldn't be the same without your care.
Remember, we heal not only with our herbs but with our words and presence.
And even though we have to keep our distance sometimes, we're as much a part of the clan as any other cat.
medi_10: Hello, y_c! Any disagreements today? Warriors can be as prickly as thistles sometimes.
Do you ever wish for a quiet day among the herbs? I sometimes wonder what it's like to be in your paws.
Your skills in keeping the peace are invaluable. Your work contributes greatly to our clan's harmony.
Remember, peace comes not only from resolving conflicts but from understanding and empathy.
Even the wisest cats can learn something new. Always be open to change.
medi_11: Ah, y_c! Are the patrols going well? Remember, not every wound is visible. Check on your warriors' spirits as well.
Do you ever wish for a simple day in the medicine den? I sometimes wonder what it's like to shoulder your responsibilities.
Your dedication and leadership are inspirational. Your clan relies on your strength and wisdom.
Remember, it's not just about leading the clan, but also about guiding them, showing them the way.
Though, even the greatest deputies need a break sometimes. Make sure to rest.
medi_12: Greetings, noble leader. Have the stars spoken to you today? Remember, sometimes they whisper, and we need to listen closely.
Do you ever wish for a day of peace in the medicine den? I sometimes wonder what it's like to lead our clan.
Your wisdom and bravery are a beacon to us all. The clan stands behind you, always.
Remember, leading isn't just about making decisions, it's about nurturing the clan's spirit.
Don't forget though, even the greatest leaders need guidance. Don't forget to look to the stars.
medi_13: Hello, y_c! How are you feeling today? Any aches or pains? You warriors are tough, but sometimes tough means stubborn.
Do you ever miss the thrill of the chase? I suppose sharing stories with the kits can be just as rewarding.
Your wisdom and tales are a treasure to the clan. You continue to guide us with your words.
Remember, even though your warrior days are behind you, your role is still important. You're the clan's memory.
Your stories not only entertain us but teach us valuable lessons. Thank you for your wisdom.
